name: @claudeautopm/plugin-data
description: Data engineering, ETL pipelines, and ML workflow specialists with Airflow, Kedro, LangGraph, Kafka, dbt, and pandas

agents.name: airflow-orchestration-expert
agents.description: Apache Airflow workflow orchestration with DAG development, task dependencies, TaskFlow API, operators, sensors, and executors. Expert in data pipelines and ETL/ELT processes.

agents.name: kedro-pipeline-expert
agents.description: Kedro data pipeline development with project structure, data catalog, pipeline orchestration, nodes, and configuration. Expert in reproducible data science workflows and MLOps.

agents.name: langgraph-workflow-expert
agents.description: LangGraph workflow orchestration with state machines, conditional routing, multi-agent collaboration, and graph-based AI workflows. Expert in stateful applications and complex decision trees.

rules.name: data-quality-standards
rules.description: Comprehensive data quality standards with Context7-verified best practices: validation, completeness, consistency, accuracy, timeliness for Airflow, Kedro, pandas, dbt

rules.name: etl-pipeline-standards
rules.description: ETL/ELT pipeline best practices with Context7-verified patterns: idempotency, incremental processing, error handling, data lineage, monitoring for all frameworks

scripts.name: airflow-dag-example
scripts.description: Airflow DAG example demonstrating Context7 patterns: TaskFlow API, task dependencies, sensors, parallel extraction, error handling

scripts.name: kafka-streaming-example
scripts.description: Kafka producer/consumer example demonstrating Context7 patterns: reliable configuration, callbacks, manual commits, graceful shutdown

scripts.name: dbt-transform-example
scripts.description: dbt transformation example demonstrating Context7 patterns: Jinja macros, ref/source, materializations, tests, documentation

scripts.name: pandas-etl-example
scripts.description: pandas ETL example demonstrating Context7 patterns: vectorized operations, GroupBy aggregations, efficient merging, data validation, quality metrics

airflow_orchestration.description: Apache Airflow workflow orchestration with DAGs and TaskFlow API

kedro_pipelines.description: Kedro reproducible data science pipelines and MLOps

langgraph_workflows.description: LangGraph stateful AI workflows and multi-agent systems

kafka_streaming.description: Apache Kafka event streaming and real-time data pipelines

dbt_transformations.description: dbt data transformations with Jinja and SQL

pandas_etl.description: pandas data manipulation and ETL processing

data_quality.description: Comprehensive data quality validation and monitoring

etl_standards.description: ETL/ELT pipeline best practices and standards
